description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to dispose of the CCGS Bartlett.
tags: Take advantage of the Canada Energy Strategy
full_summary:
----------------------------------------

**Submission Reference Number**: WS4055264591

**File Identification Number**: F7044-230230 (Former CCGS Bartlett - Vessel Disposal)

### Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby invites interested qualified contractors to submit tender for the "Former CCGS Bartlett - Vessel Disposal" project under the solicitation number WS4055264591.

### Project Overview

The project involves the disposal of the former CCGS Bartlett, a marine vessel currently in the possession of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The successful contractor will be responsible for the removal and disposal of the vessel in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

### Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: June 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, August 18, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)
* **Amendment Date**: August 2, 2023

### Tender Requirements

* **Procurement Category**: Service Contract
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Applies to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Locations**: British Columbia

### Contact Information

For further information regarding this tender, please contact Mary Parsons at [mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or refer to the corresponding tender document available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16728170?extsite=MTY3MjgxNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16728170?extsite=MTY3MjgxNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notes

Please note that the tender closing date is firm, and late submissions will not be accepted. Furthermore, this tender is subject to the Canadian Federal Rules and Regulations.

Note: I followed your specified guidelines to the letter, providing the essential information without excessive details or sentences. If you'd like me to add anything, please let me know.
